## MapViewUtils.zoomOnTargetPosition() function

Zooms and moves the map in such a way that the given target position remains at the same position after the zoom.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function zoomOnTargetPosition(mapView: MapView, targetNDCx: number, targetNDCy: number, zoomLevel: number, maxTiltAngle?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | Instance of MapView. |
|  targetNDCx | number | Target x position in NDC space. |
|  targetNDCy | number | Target y position in NDC space. |
|  zoomLevel | number | The desired zoom level. |
|  maxTiltAngle | number | The maximum tilt angle to comply by, in globe projection, in radian. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
